com.acmerobotics.roadrunner.followers

Class RamseteFollower

  • TrajectoryFollower
    • com.acmerobotics.roadrunner.followers.RamseteFollower

  • public class RamseteFollower
extends TrajectoryFollower

    Time-varying, non-linear feedback controller for nonholonomic drives. See equation 5.12 of Ramsete01.pdf.

    See Also:
    Ramsete01.pdf

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Time-varying, non-linear feedback controller for nonholonomic drives. See equation 5.12 of Ramsete01.pdf.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RamseteFollower

        public RamseteFollower(TankDrive drive,
                       double b,
                       double zeta,
                       double kV,
                       double kA,
                       double kStatic,
                       NanoClock clock)

        Time-varying, non-linear feedback controller for nonholonomic drives. See equation 5.12 of Ramsete01.pdf.

        Parameters:
        drive - tank drive
        b - b parameter (non-negative)
        zeta - zeta parameter (on (0, 1))
        kV - feedforward velocity gain
        kA - feedforward acceleration gain (currently unused)
        kStatic - additive feedforward constant (used to overcome static friction)
        clock - clock
        drive - tank drive
        b - b parameter (non-negative)
        zeta - zeta parameter (on (0, 1))
        kV - feedforward velocity gain
        kA - feedforward acceleration gain (currently unused)
        kStatic - additive feedforward constant (used to overcome static friction)
        clock - clock
        See Also:
        Ramsete01.pdf

      • RamseteFollower

        public RamseteFollower(TankDrive drive,
                       double b,
                       double zeta,
                       double kV,
                       double kA,
                       double kStatic)

        Time-varying, non-linear feedback controller for nonholonomic drives. See equation 5.12 of Ramsete01.pdf.

        Parameters:
        drive - tank drive
        b - b parameter (non-negative)
        zeta - zeta parameter (on (0, 1))
        kV - feedforward velocity gain
        kA - feedforward acceleration gain (currently unused)
        kStatic - additive feedforward constant (used to overcome static friction)
        drive - tank drive
        b - b parameter (non-negative)
        zeta - zeta parameter (on (0, 1))
        kV - feedforward velocity gain
        kA - feedforward acceleration gain (currently unused)
        kStatic - additive feedforward constant (used to overcome static friction)
        See Also:
        Ramsete01.pdf
